014package org.jdbi.v3.core.internal;
015
016import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle;
017import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
018import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;
019import java.lang.reflect.Method;
020import java.lang.reflect.Proxy;
021import java.util.Arrays;
022import java.util.Optional;
023import java.util.function.Function;
024import java.util.stream.Stream;
025
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.Jdbi;
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiConfig;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.extension.Extensions;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
030
031public class OnDemandExtensions implements JdbiConfig<OnDemandExtensions> {
032    private static final Method EQUALS_METHOD;
033    private static final Method HASHCODE_METHOD;
034    private static final Method TOSTRING_METHOD;
035
036    private Factory factory;
037
038    static {
039        try {
040            EQUALS_METHOD = Object.class.getMethod("equals", Object.class);
041            HASHCODE_METHOD = Object.class.getMethod("hashCode");
042            TOSTRING_METHOD = Object.class.getMethod("toString");
043        } catch (NoSuchMethodException wat) {
044            throw new IllegalStateException("OnDemandExtensions initialization failed", wat);
045        }
046    }
047
048    public OnDemandExtensions() {
049        factory = (d, x, t) -> Optional.empty();
050    }
051
052    private OnDemandExtensions(OnDemandExtensions other) {
053        factory = other.factory;
054    }
055
056    public OnDemandExtensions setFactory(Factory factory) {
057        this.factory = factory;
058        return this;
059    }
060
061    public <E> E create(Jdbi db, Class<E> extensionType, Class<?>... extraTypes) {
062        return extensionType.cast(
063               factory.onDemand(db, extensionType, extraTypes)
064                  .orElseGet(() -> createProxy(db, extensionType, extraTypes)));
065    }
066
067    private Object createProxy(Jdbi db, Class<?> extensionType, Class<?>... extraTypes) {
068        db.getConfig(Extensions.class).onCreateProxy();
069        InvocationHandler handler = (proxy, method, args) -> {
070            if (EQUALS_METHOD.equals(method)) {
071                return proxy == args[0];
072            }
073
074            if (HASHCODE_METHOD.equals(method)) {
075                return System.identityHashCode(proxy);
076            }
077
078            if (TOSTRING_METHOD.equals(method)) {
079                return extensionType + "@" + Integer.toHexString(System.identityHashCode(proxy));
080            }
081
082            return db.withExtension(extensionType, extension -> invoke(extension, method, args));
083        };
084
085        Class<?>[] types = Stream.of(
086                Stream.of(extensionType),
087                Arrays.stream(extensionType.getInterfaces()),
088                Arrays.stream(extraTypes))
089            .flatMap(Function.identity())
090            .distinct()
091            .toArray(Class[]::new);
092        return Proxy.newProxyInstance(extensionType.getClassLoader(), types, handler);
093    }
094
095    private static Object invoke(Object target, Method method, Object[] args) {
096        if (Proxy.isProxyClass(target.getClass())) {
097            InvocationHandler handler = Proxy.getInvocationHandler(target);
098            return Unchecked.<Object[], Object>function(params -> handler.invoke(target, method, params)).apply(args);
099        } else {
100            MethodHandle handle = Unchecked.function(MethodHandles.lookup()::unreflect).apply(method).bindTo(target);
101            return Unchecked.<Object[], Object>function(handle::invokeWithArguments).apply(args);
102        }
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public OnDemandExtensions createCopy() {
107        return new OnDemandExtensions(this);
108    }
109
110    @FunctionalInterface
111    public interface Factory {
112        Optional<Object> onDemand(Jdbi db, Class<?> extensionType, Class<?>... extraTypes);
113    }
114}
